hi and welcome you listening to the x22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1633 and today's date is August
8th 2018 and the title of the episode is
confused on what's happening with the
economy don't be this is the plan let's
get into the economic collapse financial
news now today i just wanted to break
down what is happening in the economy
and the plan to blame this all on the
fed and i want to go back in time a
little bit here to 2008 then moving
forward to understand what is happening
here now since 2008 you need to remember
we were in this great recession
everything crashed credit froze up the
government had to step in to bail out
the banks corporations because if they
didn't everything would have imploded at
that point and they didn't want this to
happen
they wanted their system to continue on
so what they did was and they figured it
out back then well if we're allowed to
create currency and this is coming from
the central bank we can prop up the
banks if we can get government to allow
us to do this well we would have a lot
more freedom to keep the system going
because remember a central bank fiat
system only lasts for a certain period
of time usually 40 to 45 years and then
it collapses from the debt level it
cannot be sustained it's designed this
way it's designed to steal all the
wealth from everyone and at the last
stage you collapse it but you cover it
up with an event like war or something
like that to say hey this is why you
need to sacrifice this is why we don't
have food on the shelves because we are
in war but really it had to do with the
economy not supporting every single
person throughout the world because the
system cannot be sustained in after the
war after everything is reduced like
population and everything else
governments would then borrow money to
rebuild the central bank would restart
the system groups would come together
and create a brand new type of system
make a currency become the reserve
currency of the world and this is what
they've done
in the past but what we've seen here is
they kept the system going a little bit
longer and they started to manipulate
the data they started to manipulate
everything because the last end stage of
this system that were in he in today was
to bring us into a one-world government
and they needed certain things in place
first and this is why you saw these
trade deals this is why you see you saw
a TPP this is why you saw all this
because they were trying to get the last
part of it
in place and this is why you saw the
refugees moving into all these different
countries to blend the countries to make
them all the same this is why you saw
the illegals coming into the US and
there were certain agendas associated
with this the biggest one was eventually
what was going to happen is they were
going to have to bring all these
countries to a level playing field so
some of the countries that were you know
making a lot of money they the workers
were making a lot of money you had to
bring the way of life down to even it
all out this was the plan and then it
got interrupted they thought the next
leader was going to be put in place most
likely Clinton and they thought okay
we're on track we're gonna be pushing
this forward the TPP would be passed
we'd have a court system above each and
every government we would have a a
one-world system where we control all
these different governments through debt
and having a court system above
government to instruct them in what to
do and we'd be able to blend all the
countries together bring everyone down
to a certain level and we can trade
workers back and forth and they didn't
expect to make more money or anything
like that well the whole thing
completely fell apart and that was the
introduction of Trump now they're in
trouble they don't know what to do and
to undo all of this which they've been
doing for a very long time and I'm
talking about the deep State the central
bank to undo all of this well there had
to be drastic measures put into place
and to do all of this
you needed to prop the u.s. back
up and this is what we see happening
right now but it's not to prop it up
right now to make it work again under
the Central Bank rule that's not the
point of it so in the beginning stages
you saw the TPP it was struck down
because we're not going in that
direction you saw the president make a
lot of bilateral trade agreements with
different countries NAFTA's under
negotiations because it was so
intertwined that Congress would have to
vote on this to remove it so they
decided to they started to negotiate
NAFTA and of course it hasn't really
gone anywhere because they've put these
things into place to make it very
difficult to get out of and you saw out
in England where they voted for a brexit
which is also having a very difficult
time so we saw all this happening and
we're starting to see that the u.s. is
doing something completely different
than the central bankers wanted then all
of a sudden you saw it tariffs because
remember what were the central bankers
doing what was the deep state doing all
this time they were taking the wealth
from the US and moving it outside of the
US and if you look back in time you can
see manufacturing was moved away
companies moved away everything was
being moved away or offloaded into other
countries where they would produce the
goods so that brings us back to tariffs
so Trump was making bilateral trade
agreements really doesn't like the
central organization to create trade
wanted to have trade with each and every
one of these countries this way it's
diversified and also started to put in
place tariffs to make it an even playing
field because we were being robbed now
the central bankers on the other hand
looked at this and said okay great he's
putting together tariffs the IMF came
out with a warning that if these tariffs
continue its going to destroy the
economy the central bankers the Biz the
rest all came out with the same exact
morning saying that this continues the
global economy will suffer things will
implode on itself
we saw financial
London's out there saying all these
tariffs are going to implode the economy
now they were setting it up where they
thought oh if he puts these tariffs in
place we know the power of the central
bank we know what they can do they can
bring the economy down and it'll be
blamed on Trump this was the central
bankers strategy meanwhile while Trump
was doing all this putting all this into
place and putting these tariffs into
place and canceling the TPP we
negotiating the NAFTA deal and making it
a little bit more of an even playing
field his plan and not just him alone
the Patriots plan was completely
different it was to push this economy to
the edge and make it crash now they
don't want to be blamed for the crash
they want the blame to be on the central
bank's so the news started out if you
remember the economy is not doing well
look at real estate it's because of
Trump's economic policies and it's not
just his policies there's other people
behind it and it's going to bring down
the economy and then all of a sudden the
GDP numbers came in four percent
unemployment kept on going down and all
of a sudden the economy looks like it's
doing better than ever people have more
savings GDP has doubled savings rate has
doubled
unemployment's going to be dropping to
three percent eventually as they keep
going and the corporate media they don't
know how to explain this because one
minute ago they were talking about how
the tariffs are going to destroy the
economy the IMF was out there saying how
the tariffs are going to destroy the
economy and now everything looks better
than ever
GDP 4% some say might even go to 5%
unemployment the lowest we've ever seen
it people are getting off food stamps
this whole thing doesn't make sense it's
very confusing the plan is to trick the
central banks to trick the mainstream
media almost like North Korea where you
think something's happening but behind
the scenes other things are happening
now remember what is happening here is
to push the central bank into doing
something so they're to blame for the
crash so if the economy is really doing
well in the central bank over many many
months have been saying we're gonna
raise the rates if the unemployment rate
comes down we're gonna raise the rates
if we see inflation ticking up this is
fantastic we're gonna raise the rates if
GDP is better and you start to see all
this happen now the central bank the Fed
well since they've been talking about
this all along and they've been raising
the rates they're gonna have to continue
this Trump put it out there that hey I
don't think you should be raising the
rates but you do what's best now he set
them up this whole thing is a setup now
yes there are people out there really
thinking that the economy is doing well
this is part of the plan the illusion to
make everyone believe that Trump has
created this in this economy that's
better than ever it's screaming right
now but if you look at all the
fundamentals and everything behind it
nothing's really changed all they did
was change the system these statistical
numbers that's all they've done that's
all I've done right now nothing else has
changed at all but we don't have new
plants coming in and more of the
manufacturing moving out of China
out of Korea out of all these other
countries moving back to the United
States we don't see that as of yet and
it's not going to be that easy you just
can't take everything that was changed
by the central bank in the deep state
and just flip it around in a year and a
half that's quite impossible it's not
going to happen so you can see what is
happening here there's an illusion going
on that the economy's doing well and
it's being done on purpose to force the
central bank and again remember we've
been talking about who's going to
control the narrative it's to force the
central bank into raising the rates and
if we go back to two thousand five six
seven you can
see what the central bank did back then
as soon as they hit a certain point
everything started to fall apart and
they knew what was going to happen and
they crashed the economy why because
they knew they were they were going to
need to print money like there was no
tomorrow and the only way to do this was
to crash the economy and show that the
economy needs this they need to pass a
bill where it allows the Fed to do
things they've never done before but
here we are today this time is going to
be completely different because this
time the narrative is not going to be
owned by the central bank the narrative
is going to be owned by Trump in the
Patriots and Trump is not going to crash
the economy he's gonna force the central
bank to crash the economy because what's
happening here is he's showing the world
look how great the US economy is doing
right now look at our GDP numbers look
at our unemployment numbers look what's
happening here so with the economy doing
so well with NAFTA being renegotiated
TPP struck down bilateral trades tariffs
how in the world is the economy going to

impossible isn't it so on one side we

economy is stronger than we've ever seen
it before
now he wants the central bank the Fed to
do what they do best raise your rates
why because you know what's best for the
economy he said this he set them up so
now the Fed is going to raise the rates
now remember to make the economy strong
yes there's going to be defense spending
actually that's on purpose because the
US forces have been weakened for a very
long time because
once we were under the control of the UN
and all the deep state actors and
central bank's they didn't want a

not building the military up to go
invade countries building the military

state from the intelligence agencies to

not to invade very big difference now
again there's going to be deep state
actors outside of the country it's to

wants the fed and is trying to force the

possible they don't have to raise them
that much
everyone's projecting around three
percent or so and all of a sudden
everything will start to crash down now
the central bank they realize what's

until the end now remember don't get

well go back prior to 2008 how well was

unemployment was pretty darn low and I

was hitting all-time new highs and
everyone thought it was never going to

what did they do they shorted the house
they shorted the subprime security
market because they looked inside and
said this is all garbage and everyone

would this system that's doing so great
ever fail housing will never go down
they'll never collect on this stuff it's
rated triple-a just because statistics
and rating agencies are
telling you something it doesn't mean
it's true
it means they created an illusion Q has
always told us enjoy the show this is a

by the way all these years the economy's

and this is why Trump has Andrew Jackson

because all this debt all this currency
I mean it's gonna go to zero people are

people are gonna have trouble with it
but we are headed in that direction you
